section.name: Mailing Lists
section.p: EJBCA has two public mailing lists hosted on Sourceforge. To subscribe to any of the lists or browse archived messages, click the links below.
ejbca-news delivers news such as new releases or important features. This is a low traffic list.
ejbca-develop is used for development discussions of a more technical nature. Almost anything regarding EJBCA can be posted on this list.

section.name: Discussion Forums
section.p: There are also several public discussion forums that are used for discussions and requests for help etc.

section.name: IRC
section.p: There is an ICR channel, #ejbca, on irc.freenode.net where support questions can be asked. We are usually there during European office hours, and some other times as well.
